item.title: Email to Steve Easterbrook and the Board of Directors of McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: From : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) (info@europe-v-mcdonalds.org) Subject : Phone call about McDonald’s Monopoly frauds Date sent : May 31, 2019 at 23:36（Beijing time） To : Steve EASTERBROOK, Board of Directors of McDonald’s Corporation (bod@us.mcd.com) THIS EMAIL IS ALSO ADDRESSED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF MCDONALD’S CORPORATION. I AM FORMALLY ASKING THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF MCDONALD’S CORPORATION TO IMMEDIATELY START AN OFFICIAL INQUIRY INTO THE MCDONALD’S MONOPOLY FRAUDS WHICH HAVE HAPPENED ACROSS EUROPE AND ACROSS THE WORLD FOR THE LAST FEW YEARS.

item.title: FORMAL NOTICE to McDonald’s executives, including future CEO Chris Kempczinski, about the illegality of the McDonald’s Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: FORMAL NOTICE : ILLEGAL LOTTERY USA Date sent: February 14, 2017, 23:21 (Beijing time) To: Chris Kempczinski, Steve Easterbrook, Gloria Santona, Silvia Lagnado, Deborah Wahl THIS EMAIL CONTAINS WHAT I BELIEVE TO BE VERY IMPORTANT LEGAL INFORMATION. DON’T DISREGARD IT! Dear Sir or Madam, This a formal notice to warn you that your McDonald’s Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States actually qualifies, to the best of my knowledge, as an illegal lottery!

item.title: PLEASE STOP THE FRAUD!
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: please stop the fraud! Date sent: 2015-10-30 at 22:25 (Beijing time +0800) To: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com>, Gloria Santona (Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com), Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> Dear Mr. Easterbrook, dear Ms. Santona, and dear Mr. Hicks, I repeat again. Please stop the fraud. You must make it stop! I know you know this “game” is a fraud under European laws. You can not possibly be so stupid not to understand except if you don’t understand on purpose so that you can later claim plausible deniability.

item.title: Additional frauds; email sent to McDonald’s General Counsel CCed to McDonald’s CEO
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: additional frauds Date sent: 2015-10-22 11:06 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona (Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com) Cc: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com> Ms Santona, Thank you for answering me. Could you please make sure the French team communicate with me by email? Normal mail takes forever for me to receive now that I live in China and I am not going to wait one month to act if there is an ongoing fraud.

item.title: Reply from Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: KEY POINT OF THIS EVENT: By acknowledging that McDonald’s Corporation executives “take such inquiries seriously”, McDonald’s Corporation can’t claim plausible deniability anymore. Furthermore, the email from Ms. Santona who is the General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation is CCed to the CEO of McDonald’s Corporation Steve Easterbrook. From: Gloria Santona (Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com) Subject: Re: update Date received：2015-10-21 23:47 (Beijing time +0800) To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Cc: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com> Thanks for your follow-up note.

item.title: Email sent to Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation, requesting an update
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: update Date sent：2015-10-21 22:45 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona (Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com) Cc: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com> Ms. Santona, I would like to give a friendly reminder that I gave McDonald’s a deadline of October 22nd 2015 midnight GMT time. So you have about 36 hours left. It was 4 entire days which is more than enough considering I’ve sent my first cease and desist letter back in 2012.

item.title: Fraud of the century: emails to McDonald’s executives
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Fraud of the century Date sent: October 20, 2015 at 03:13 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona (Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com) Cc: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com>, Robert Gibbs (Robert.Gibbs@us.mcd.com), Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Kevin Ozan <Kevin.Ozan@us.mcd.com>, Jim Sappington (Jim.Sappington@us.mcd.com), Mike Andres (Mike.Andres@us.mcd.com) Ms. Santona, First of all, I want to thank you for having taken my phone call today without hanging up on me right away. Your counter-part in France, Mme de Borda, always refused to communicate with me through phone.
